SEARCH
Package Engine

Class Replicator

java.lang.Object
Engine.Replicator
public class Replicator extends Object
The Replicator class handles the replication of entities and game data between the host and clients in the game engine. It is responsible for sending and receiving entity data and game map data between the host and clients.
Author:
haotian
